questions.question: Which of these is an infinite set?

answers.a: all rational numbers from 1 to 1 billion

explanations.a: There are infinitely many rational numbers between any two rational numbers
explanations.b: There are infinitely many real numbers between any two real numbers
explanations.c: there are infinite negative integers smaller than any integer

questions.question: A function exists where each element of the domain is mapped to one element of the co domain which is of same size. this function is ______
A function f(x)=4x has domain that is first 4 natural numbers and co domain that is first 16 natural numbers. the function is ______

explanations.a: the function is one to one or surjective because f(x) only has one value for any possible value of x
explanations.b: the function is not surjective as there are elements in the co domain that aren't mapped to any element of the domain, like 5
explanations.c: the function is not bijective because it isn't surjective. BIjective function must be both injective and surjective.
